com.microsoft.azure.storage

Class Credentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.storage.Credentials

  • public final class Credentials
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the credentials used to sign a request against the storage services.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Credentials(java.lang.String accountName, byte[] key)
      Creates an instance of the Credentials class, using the specified storage account name and access key; the specified access key is in the form of a byte array.
      Credentials(java.lang.String accountName, java.lang.String key)
      Creates an instance of the Credentials class, using the specified storage account name and access key; the specified access key is stored as a Base64-encoded String.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String exportBase64EncodedKey()
      Exports the value of the access key to a Base64-encoded string.
      byte[] exportKey()
      Exports the value of the access key to an array of bytes.
      java.lang.String getAccountName()
      Gets the account name to be used when signing the request.
      StorageKey getKey()
      Returns the access key to be used when signing the request.
      java.lang.String getKeyName()
      Gets the name of the access key to be used when signing the request.
      protected void setAccountName(java.lang.String accountName)
      Sets the account name to be used when signing the request.
      protected void setKeyName(java.lang.String keyName)
      Sets the name of the access key to be used when signing the request.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Credentials

        public Credentials(java.lang.String accountName,
                   byte[] key)
        Creates an instance of the Credentials class, using the specified storage account name and access key; the specified access key is in the form of a byte array.
        Parameters:
        accountName - A String that represents the name of the storage account.
        key - An array of bytes that represent the account access key.

      • Credentials

        public Credentials(java.lang.String accountName,
                   java.lang.String key)
        Creates an instance of the Credentials class, using the specified storage account name and access key; the specified access key is stored as a Base64-encoded String.
        Parameters:
        accountName - A String that represents the name of the storage account.
        key - A String that represents the Base64-encoded account access key.

    • Method Detail

      • exportBase64EncodedKey

        public java.lang.String exportBase64EncodedKey()
        Exports the value of the access key to a Base64-encoded string.
        Returns:
        A String that represents the Base64-encoded access key.

      • exportKey

        public byte[] exportKey()
        Exports the value of the access key to an array of bytes.
        Returns:
        A byte array that represents the access key.

      • getAccountName

        public java.lang.String getAccountName()
        Gets the account name to be used when signing the request.
        Returns:
        A String that represents the account name to be used when signing the request.

      • getKeyName

        public java.lang.String getKeyName()
        Gets the name of the access key to be used when signing the request. Internal use only.

      • getKey

        public StorageKey getKey()
        Returns the access key to be used when signing the request.
        Returns:
        A String that represents the access key to be used when signing the request.

      • setAccountName

        protected void setAccountName(java.lang.String accountName)
        Sets the account name to be used when signing the request.
        Parameters:
        accountName - A String that represents the account name being set.

      • setKeyName

        protected void setKeyName(java.lang.String keyName)
        Sets the name of the access key to be used when signing the request.
        Parameters:
        keyName - A String that represents the name of the access key to be used when signing the request.
